title: Biomedical NLP: Vaccines - John Snow Labs
description: High Performance NLP with Apache Spark
cleaned_text: Vaccines - Live Demos & Notebooks Multilabel Classification For LitCovid This demo determines the relevant COVID-19 topics of an article based on its abstract. [(...)](#) Classify Self-Reported Covid-19 Symptoms from Posts This model classifies self-reported Covid-19 symptoms in Spanish tweets. [(...)](#) Classify Self Report Vaccination Status from Posts This model involves the identification of self-reported COVID-19 vaccination status in English tweets. [(...)](#) Classify Stance About Public Health Mandates from Posts These models classify person as (1) having or not having stance and as (2) having or not having premise (argument) about health mandates
